hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT new omis.search.report.PersonSearchResult(an.id, an.person.id, an.firstName, an.middleName, an.lastName, an.suffix) FROM omis.person.domain.PersonName an WHERE (utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName), upper(:name2)) >= 90) AND utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName), upper(:name1)) >= 85)) ORDER BY an.lastName, an.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.PersonSearchResult(an.id, an.person.id, an.firstName, an.middleName, an.lastName, an.suffix ) FROM omis.person.domain.PersonName an WHERE utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName), upper(:last)) >= 90 AND (utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.middleName), upper(:middle)) >= 90 OR upper(an.middleName) like upper(:middle) || '%' OR an.middleName is null OR an.middleName like '') AND utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName),upper(:first)) > 85 ORDER BY an.lastName, an.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.PersonSearchResult(a.name.id, a.id, a.name.firstName, a.name.middleName, a.name.lastName, a.name.suffix ) FROM omis.person.domain.Person a WHERE utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(a.name.firstName),upper(:name1)) >= 85 AND utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(a.name.lastName),upper(:name2)) >= 90 ORDER BY a.name.lastName, a.name.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.PersonSearchResult(p.name.id, p.id, p.name.firstName, p.name.middleName, p.name.lastName, p.name.suffix ) FROM omis.person.domain.Person p WHERE upper(p.name.lastName) like upper(:name || '%' ) ORDER BY p.name.lastName, p.name.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.PersonSearchResult(p.name.id, p.id, p.name.firstName, p.name.middleName, p.name.lastName, p.name.suffix) FROM omis.person.domain.Person p WHERE p.id = :id ORDER BY p.name.lastName, p.name.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.PersonSearchResult( p.name.id, p.id, name.firstName, name.middleName, name.lastName, name.suffix) FROM omis.person.domain.Person p inner join p.name name inner join p.identity identity WHERE identity.socialSecurityNumber = :ssn ORDER BY p.name.lastName, p.name.firstName

SELECT distinct new omis.search.report.OffenderSearchResult(an.id, an.person.id, o.offenderNumber, an.firstName, an.middleName, an.lastName, an.suffix) FROM omis.person.domain.PersonName an, omis.offender.domain.Offender o WHERE (utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName),upper(:name2)) >= 85 OR upper(an.firstName) like upper(:name2)||'%') AND utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName),upper(:name1)) >= 90 AND an.person = o ORDER BY utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName),upper(:name2)) + utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName),upper(:name1)) DESC

SELECT new omis.search.report.OffenderSearchResult(an.id, an.person.id, o.offenderNumber, an.firstName, an.middleName, an.lastName, an.suffix ) FROM omis.offender.domain.Offender o, omis.person.domain.PersonName an WHERE utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName), upper(:last)) >= 90 AND (utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.middleName), upper(:middle)) >= 90 OR upper(an.middleName) like upper(:middle) || '%' OR an.middleName is null OR an.middleName like '') AND utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName),upper(:first)) >= 85 AND an.person = o ORDER BY utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName),upper(:first)) + utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName),upper(:last)) + utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.middleName), upper(:middle)) DESC

SELECT new omis.search.report.OffenderSearchResult(n.id, o.id, o.offenderNumber, n.firstName, n.middleName, n.lastName, n.suffix ) FROM omis.offender.domain.Offender o LEFT JOIN o.name n WHERE :offenderNumber = o.offenderNumber ORDER BY o.name.lastName, o.name.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.OffenderSearchResult(o.name.id, o.id, o.offenderNumber, o.name.firstName, o.name.middleName, o.name.lastName, o.name.suffix ) FROM omis.offender.domain.Offender o WHERE upper(o.name.lastName) like upper(:name || '%') OR utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(o.name.lastName),upper(:name)) >= 90 ORDER BY utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(o.name.lastName),upper(:name)) DESC, o.name.lastName, o.name.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.OffenderSearchResult(o.name.id, o.id, o.offenderNumber, o.name.firstName, o.name.middleName, o.name.lastName, o.name.suffix) FROM omis.offender.domain.Offender o WHERE o.id = :id ORDER BY o.name.lastName, o.name.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.OffenderSearchResult( o.name.id, o.id, o.offenderNumber, name.firstName, name.middleName, name.lastName, name.suffix) FROM omis.offender.domain.Offender o inner join o.name name inner join o.identity identity WHERE identity.socialSecurityNumber = :ssn ORDER BY o.name.lastName, o.name.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.UserSearchResult(ua.id, an.person.id, an.id, an.firstName, an.middleName, an.lastName, an.suffix, ua.username) FROM omis.person.domain.PersonName an, omis.user.domain.UserAccount as ua WHERE utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName),upper(:name1)) >= 85 AND utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName),upper(:name2)) >= 90 AND ua.user = an.person ORDER BY utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName),upper(:name1)) + utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName),upper(:name2)) DESC

SELECT new omis.search.report.UserSearchResult(ua.id, an.person.id, an.id, an.firstName, an.middleName, an.lastName, an.suffix, ua.username) FROM omis.person.domain.PersonName an, omis.user.domain.UserAccount as ua WHERE utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName),upper(:name1)) >= 85 AND utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName),upper(:name2)) >= 90 AND an.person = ua.user ORDER BY utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.firstName),upper(:name1)) + utl_match.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(upper(an.lastName),upper(:name2)) DESC

select new omis.search.report.UserSearchResult(ua.id, an.person.id, an.id, an.firstName, an.middleName, an.lastName, an.suffix, ua.username ) from omis.person.domain.PersonName an, omis.user.domain.UserAccount as ua where upper(ua.username) like upper(:username) and an.person = ua.user ORDER BY an.lastName, an.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.UserSearchResult(ua.id, ua.user.id, ua.user.name.id, ua.user.name.firstName, ua.user.name.middleName, ua.user.name.lastName, ua.user.name.suffix, ua.username ) FROM omis.person.domain.PersonName an, omis.user.domain.UserAccount as ua WHERE upper(an.lastName) like upper(:name || '%') AND an.person = ua.user ORDER BY an.lastName, an.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.UserSearchResult(ua.id, an.person.id, an.id, an.firstName, an.middleName, an.lastName, an.suffix, ua.username) FROM omis.person.domain.PersonName an, omis.user.domain.UserAccount ua WHERE ua.id = :id AND an.person = ua.user ORDER BY an.lastName, an.firstName

SELECT new omis.search.report.UserSearchResult( ua.id, user.id, name.id, name.firstName, name.middleName, name.lastName, name.suffix, ua.username) FROM omis.user.domain.UserAccount ua inner join ua.user user inner join user.name name inner join user.identity identity WHERE identity.socialSecurityNumber = :ssn ORDER BY name.lastName, name.firstName
